TEXT.TITLE: BRAZIL TO EXPORT POULTRY, MEAT TO IRAQ FOR OIL
TEXT.BODY: Brazil will export 6,000 tonnes of poultry and 10,000 tonnes of frozen meat to Iraq in exchange for oil, Petrobras Commercial Director Carlos Sant'Anna said. Brazil has a barter deal with Iraq and currently imports 215,000 barrels per day of oil, of which 170,000 bpd are paid for with exports of Brazilian goods to that country. Reuter
